rawText:
"Best Student" Award – Received 4 times during college tenure
Orange World Record Holder – Completed 1144.10 hours non-stop online Mutamil Kalai Villa (May–July
2021)
Zonal Level Finalist – Federal Bank Speak for India Competition
District Level First Prize – Poetry competition (Awarded by Collector Mr. Meganatha Reddy, IAS)
Awardee – Speech competition, Book Festival (Awarded by Collector Mr. V.P. Jeyaselan, IAS)
A  passionate  and  dynamic  teaching  professional  specializing  in  Commerce  and  Accountancy,  aiming  to
foster  a  love  for  learning  through  motivational  and  interactive  teaching  methods.  With  a  strong  academic
background,  extensive  public  speaking  experience,  and  a  proven  record  of  leadership,  I  seek  to  contribute
effectively to the holistic development of students while continually evolving as an educator.
Qualification                                                           Institution                                                  Year of Completion
B.Ed                                                             P.S.N.L College, Sattur                                                    2025
M.Com                                                   Sri Krishnasamy College, Sattur                                           2023
B.Com                                                   Sri Krishnasamy College, Sattur                                            2021
Intern Teacher
Subject Expertise: Commerce, Accountancy
Public Speaking & Communication
Leadership & Motivation
Creative Writing & Poetry
Classroom Management
Event Coordination
Student Engagement Strategies
Motivational speaker with over 204 stage
appearances.
Guest Speaker at JCI and Rotary Club events
in Sattur and Sivakasi.
Co-author of 6 published books (Poetry and
Literature).
Event Organizer – Successfully organized and
managed various programs and cultural events
in college
Municipal Higher Secondary School, Sattur
Taught PG school students for 80 days as part of B.Ed internship
Developed lesson plans, assessed student progress, and conducted engaging classroom sessions
Sep - Jan
P R O F E S S I O N A L   O B J E C T I V E
P U B L I C   S P E A K E R
6381564418    |    tkarthi6381@gmail.com
KARTHIK KUMAR T
T E A C H I N G   E X P E R I E N C E
A W A R D S  &  A C H I E V E M E N T S
K E Y   S K I L L SL E A D E R S H I P  &  E V E N T   M A N A G E M E N T
E D U C A T I O N A L   Q U A L I F I C A T I O N S

Jeyaselan, IAS) A passionate and dynamic teaching professional specializing in Commerce and Accountancy, aiming to foster a love for learning through motivational and interactive teaching methods. With a strong academic background, extensive public speaking experience, and a proven record of leadership, I seek to contribute effectively to the holistic development of students while continually evolving as an educator. Guest Speaker at JCI and Rotary Club events in Sattur and Sivakasi. Co-author of 6 published books (Poetry and Literature).
